testcase.classname: To check whether add to cart is working properly or not
testcase.name: To validate add to cart button
testcase.system-out: Given User have to Enter Amazon Website throughh Chrome Browser.............passed And User have to click signin button........................................passed And User have to pass "<email>".............................................passed And click Continue button...................................................passed And User have to send "<password>"..........................................passed And click sigin button......................................................passed And User have to click in Search tab........................................passed And In search tab Enter Mobiles.............................................passed And Click Search button.....................................................passed And Click any product in new page...........................................passed Then Click add to cart button...............................................passed
